short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take anything you can see on a web page, and pin it to Pinterest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PinSnapper lets you take anything you see on a web page, and create a Pinterest pin from it.  Just click the PinSnapper icon, drag a rectangle, and you've created a Pin!
